amendment.description: To permit the extension of 350 nonimmigrant permits for workers in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

vote.text: Amendment SA 744 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 744 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S4686; text: CR S4686) To permit the extension of 350 nonimmigrant permits for workers in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 744 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 744 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
